toolDetails.uuid-generator.description: UUID generation tool, creates globally unique identifiers. Supports UUID v4 standard, widely used in database primary keys, API tokens and distributed systems.
toolDetails.uuid-generator.tips.0: UUID v4 is based on random numbers with high security
toolDetails.uuid-generator.tips.1: UUID length is fixed at 36 characters (with hyphens)
toolDetails.uuid-generator.tips.2: UUIDs rarely duplicate in distributed environments
toolDetails.uuid-generator.tips.3: Consider performance impact when used as database primary keys
toolDetails.uuid-generator.faq.0.a: UUID v4 is based on random algorithms with extremely low duplication probability, can be considered unique.
toolDetails.uuid-generator.faq.1.q: Are UUIDs suitable as database primary keys?
toolDetails.uuid-generator.faq.1.a: Yes, but UUIDs are longer and may affect index performance, need to weigh the trade-offs.
toolDetails.password-generator.descripti: Password generation tool that creates high-strength random passwords. Supports customizable length and character sets, provides password strength assessment to ensure account security.
Character set selection (uppercase, lowercase, numbers, symbols)
toolDetails.password-generator.tips.0: Password length should be at least 12 characters
toolDetails.password-generator.tips.1: Include uppercase, lowercase letters, numbers and special symbols
toolDetails.password-generator.tips.2: Regularly change passwords for important accounts
toolDetails.password-generator.tips.3: Use different passwords for different websites
toolDetails.password-generator.faq.0.q: What makes a password most secure?
toolDetails.password-generator.faq.0.a: Random combinations of 12+ characters including uppercase, lowercase letters, numbers, and special symbols are most secure.
toolDetails.password-generator.faq.1.a: Based on length, character types, randomness and other factors, avoiding common patterns.
toolDetails.image-compressor.description: Image compression tool that reduces image file size while maintaining visual quality. Supports JPEG, PNG and other formats, optimizing website loading speed.
toolDetails.image-compressor.tips.0: JPEG is suitable for photos, PNG for icons and transparent images
toolDetails.image-compressor.tips.1: Web images are recommended to be compressed below 100KB
toolDetails.image-compressor.tips.3: Choose appropriate compression level based on usage
toolDetails.image-compressor.faq.0.a: Lossy compression will reduce details, but visual effects remain good with reasonable settings.
toolDetails.image-compressor.faq.1.a: Balance file size and quality based on usage scenario, web usage can be moderately compressed.
toolDetails.image-watermark.description: Image watermark tool that adds text or image watermarks to pictures. Protects image copyright, prevents unauthorized use, supports various watermark style settings.
toolDetails.image-watermark.tips.0: Choose watermark position that doesn't block important content
toolDetails.image-watermark.tips.1: Balance visibility and aesthetics with opacity settings
toolDetails.image-watermark.tips.2: Use contrasting colors for text watermarks
toolDetails.image-watermark.tips.3: Consider watermark adaptation for different image sizes
toolDetails.image-watermark.faq.0.q: Can watermarks completely prevent image theft?
toolDetails.image-watermark.faq.0.a: Watermarks can act as a deterrent, but cannot completely prevent theft, more effective with other protection measures.
toolDetails.image-watermark.faq.1.a: Recommend choosing areas that don't affect main content while ensuring watermarks are not easily cropped.
toolDetails.unicode-converter.descriptio: Unicode encoding conversion tool that handles encoding conversion between Chinese and Unicode. Solves character encoding issues, supports various Unicode representation formats.
toolDetails.unicode-converter.tips.0: Unicode is an international standard character encoding
toolDetails.unicode-converter.tips.3: UTF-8 is one implementation of Unicode
toolDetails.unicode-converter.faq.0.q: What's the difference between Unicode and UTF-8?
toolDetails.unicode-converter.faq.0.a: Unicode is a character set standard, UTF-8 is one of the encoding implementations of Unicode.
toolDetails.unicode-converter.faq.1.a: Usually because encoding and decoding use different character sets, or the character set doesn't support the corresponding characters.
toolDetails.cron-parser.description: Cron expression parsing tool for parsing and validating scheduled task Cron expressions. Supports Linux and Spring formats, shows execution time and rule descriptions.
toolDetails.cron-parser.features.0: Linux and Spring Cron format support
toolDetails.cron-parser.tips.0: Linux Cron has 5 fields, Spring Cron has 6 fields
toolDetails.cron-parser.tips.2: Comma (,) is used to enumerate multiple values
toolDetails.cron-parser.tips.3: Hyphen (-) represents range, slash (/) represents interval
toolDetails.cron-parser.faq.0.q: How does Cron expression represent execution every 5 minutes?
toolDetails.cron-parser.faq.1.q: How to avoid overlapping Cron task execution?
toolDetails.cron-parser.faq.1.a: Set reasonable execution intervals, use locking mechanisms to prevent concurrent execution of the same task.
toolDetails.text-analyzer.description: Text analysis tool that provides comprehensive text statistics and analysis features. Includes character, word, line counts, reading time estimation, and keyword analysis.
toolDetails.text-analyzer.useCases.1: Social media copy word count control
toolDetails.text-analyzer.tips.0: Reading speed standards vary for different languages
toolDetails.text-analyzer.tips.1: Word frequency analysis helps discover content focus
toolDetails.text-analyzer.tips.2: Pay attention to keyword density for SEO optimization
toolDetails.text-analyzer.faq.0.a: Based on average reading speed (200-250 words per minute), actual time varies by person.
toolDetails.text-analyzer.faq.1.q: What is word frequency analysis for?
toolDetails.text-analyzer.faq.1.a: Helps identify text themes, optimize keyword distribution, and improve content quality.
toolDetails.qr-generator.description: QR code generation tool that converts text, URLs, contact information into high-quality QR code images. Supports various sizes and custom style settings.
toolDetails.qr-generator.features.0: Support text, URLs, WiFi info and other content types
toolDetails.qr-generator.features.1: Adjustable QR code size and quality
toolDetails.qr-generator.features.2: Support PNG, JPG, SVG format output
toolDetails.qr-generator.tips.0: More content makes QR codes more complex, requiring closer scanning distance
toolDetails.qr-generator.tips.1: Choose appropriate error correction level to balance capacity and reliability
toolDetails.qr-generator.tips.3: Test scanning effects on different devices
toolDetails.qr-generator.faq.0.q: How much information can QR codes store?
toolDetails.qr-generator.faq.0.a: Depends on content type, up to 7089 numeric characters, about 1800 Chinese characters.
toolDetails.qr-generator.faq.1.q: Can damaged QR codes still be scanned?
toolDetails.qr-generator.faq.1.a: QR codes have error correction functionality, slight damage can still be scanned normally.
toolDetails.diff.description: Text comparison tool for comparing differences between two texts. Supports line-by-line comparison, highlights changed content, widely used in code review and version management.
toolDetails.diff.features.1: Highlight added, deleted, and modified content
toolDetails.diff.features.3: Ignore whitespace and line break options
toolDetails.diff.tips.0: Large file comparison may take longer
toolDetails.diff.tips.1: Can ignore whitespace and line breaks to focus on content changes
toolDetails.diff.tips.2: Use side-by-side view for easier context viewing
toolDetails.diff.faq.0.q: How to handle large file comparison?
toolDetails.diff.faq.0.a: Recommend splitting large files into smaller chunks for comparison, or use professional file comparison tools.
toolDetails.diff.faq.1.a: Can screenshot the results or copy difference content to other documents.
toolDetails.text-processor.description: Text processing tool that provides batch text editing functionality. Supports case conversion, deduplication, sorting, replacement and various text operations to improve text processing efficiency.
toolDetails.text-processor.tips.0: Recommend backing up original text before batch operations
toolDetails.text-processor.tips.1: Can combine multiple operations for complex processing
toolDetails.text-processor.tips.2: Pay attention to processing differences between English and Chinese
toolDetails.text-processor.tips.3: Be aware of browser performance limitations when processing large files
toolDetails.text-processor.faq.0.a: Use find and replace function with regular expressions to precisely delete specific characters.
toolDetails.text-processor.faq.1.q: What to note when processing Chinese text?
toolDetails.text-processor.faq.1.a: Chinese has no obvious word boundaries, need to consider character characteristics when counting and processing.
toolDetails.csv-converter.description: CSV and JSON format conversion tool that supports table data conversion between different formats. Suitable for data import/export, format migration and data analysis scenarios.
toolDetails.csv-converter.tips.0: Ensure CSV files have clear headers
toolDetails.csv-converter.tips.1: Pay attention to handling data fields containing commas
toolDetails.csv-converter.tips.2: Handle nested objects carefully when converting JSON to CSV
toolDetails.csv-converter.tips.3: Recommend batch processing for large files
toolDetails.csv-converter.faq.0.q: How to handle data with special characters?
toolDetails.csv-converter.faq.0.a: Use quotes to enclose fields containing commas and line breaks, or choose other delimiters.
toolDetails.csv-converter.faq.1.q: How to convert nested JSON objects to CSV?
toolDetails.csv-converter.faq.1.a: Nested objects will be flattened into multiple columns or converted to string format.
toolDetails.markdown-preview.description: Markdown preview tool that provides real-time Markdown rendering functionality. Supports standard Markdown syntax, helps with writing and previewing document content.
toolDetails.markdown-preview.tips.0: Familiarize with common Markdown syntax to improve efficiency
toolDetails.markdown-preview.tips.1: Use code blocks to display technical content
toolDetails.markdown-preview.tips.2: Use heading hierarchy reasonably to organize content
toolDetails.markdown-preview.tips.3: Pay attention to display effects on different devices when previewing
toolDetails.markdown-preview.faq.0.q: What's the difference between Markdown and HTML?
toolDetails.markdown-preview.faq.0.a: Markdown is more concise and easy to write, HTML is more flexible and powerful. Markdown eventually converts to HTML.
toolDetails.markdown-preview.faq.1.q: How to insert images in Markdown?
toolDetails.markdown-preview.faq.1.a: Use ![alt text](image-url) syntax, or directly use HTML img tags.

base64.pageDescription: Free online Base64 encoder/decoder tool, supports text, Chinese, URL, JSON encoding and decoding with one click. Ad-free, fast, clipboard support - essential tool for developers and operations.

base64.description: Base64 is an encoding method based on 64 printable characters to represent binary data. Widely used for transmitting data in systems that do not support binary data, such as email and HTTP transmission scenarios.

features.0: Support text Base64 encoding and decoding

useCases.0: Image data URI encoding in web development
useCases.1: Binary data transmission in API interfaces
useCases.4: Simple encoding of sensitive information in configuration files

tips.0: Base64 encoded data size will increase by about 33%
tips.1: The '=' at the end of the encoding result is a padding character for alignment
tips.2: Base64 is not an encryption method, just encoding conversion
tips.3: Suitable for small file processing, large files are recommended to be processed in blocks

0.a: Base64 is just encoding conversion and does not provide encryption functionality. Anyone can easily decode it, do not use it for sensitive information protection.

1.q: Why does the string become longer after encoding?
1.a: Base64 encodes every 3 bytes into 4 characters, so the encoded length will increase by about 33%.

json-formatter.description: JSON formatting tool that helps developers beautify, validate and compress JSON data. Supports syntax highlighting, error detection and format conversion.

tips.0: JSON strings must use double quotes, not single quotes
tips.1: Object key names must be surrounded by quotes
tips.2: Does not support comments and trailing commas

0.q: What is the use of JSON formatting?
0.a: Formatted JSON is easier to read, convenient for debugging and understanding data structures, especially suitable for API development and debugging.

1.a: Compressing JSON can reduce file size and improve network transmission efficiency, commonly used for API responses in production environments.

regex-tester.description: Regular expression testing tool that helps developers write, test and debug regular expressions. Supports real-time match preview, capture group display and replacement functionality.

features.2: Support global, case-insensitive and other modifiers

useCases.0: Form validation rule writing and testing

tips.0: Using non-greedy matching (?) can avoid over-matching
tips.1: Complex regex should be tested step by step and gradually improved
tips.2: Pay attention to the use of escape characters, especially in strings
tips.3: Make good use of character classes [\d\w\s] to simplify expressions

0.q: How to optimize regular expression performance?
0.a: Avoid excessive use of quantifiers, use anchors (^$) reasonably, simplify character classes, and avoid deep nesting.

1.q: How to test complex regular expressions?
1.a: It is recommended to break them down into small parts and test them separately, then combine them. Use online tools to visualize regex structure.

url-encoder.description: URL encoding/decoding tool for handling special characters in URLs. When URLs contain spaces, Chinese characters, or special symbols, encoding is needed to ensure proper transmission.

features.0: Support URL and query parameter encoding

tips.0: URL encoding uses % followed by two hexadecimal digits to represent characters
tips.1: Spaces can be encoded as %20 or + (in query parameters)
tips.2: Chinese characters usually use UTF-8 encoding
tips.3: Don't encode the entire URL, only encode parameter parts

0.q: What's the difference between URL encoding and Base64 encoding?
0.a: URL encoding mainly handles special characters in URLs, while Base64 converts binary data to text format.

1.q: When do you need URL encoding?
1.a: When URLs contain spaces, Chinese characters, special symbols, or reserved characters, encoding is needed to ensure correct URL format.

timestamp.description: Unix timestamp conversion tool that supports bidirectional conversion between timestamps and human-readable time formats. Widely used in server development, database storage, and API interfaces.

features.0: Support second and millisecond level timestamps

tips.0: Unix timestamp starts counting from January 1, 1970
tips.1: JavaScript uses millisecond timestamps, backends often use seconds
tips.2: Pay attention to timezone differences, recommend using UTC time

0.a: This is a Unix system convention, called 'Unix Epoch', which facilitates computer time processing.

1.a: It's recommended to use UTC timestamps for storage and convert based on user timezone for display.

jwt-decoder.description: JWT (JSON Web Token) decoding tool for parsing and validating JWT token structure and content. Helps developers debug authentication and authorization systems.

tips.0: JWT contains three parts: header, payload, signature
tips.1: Payload contains user information and permission claims
tips.2: JWT is stateless, server doesn't store sessions
tips.3: Pay attention to token expiration time and refresh mechanism

0.a: JWT itself is secure, but requires proper implementation of signature verification and expiration checking.

1.a: Need to use the same key and algorithm as when issued to verify signature validity.

hash-generator.description: Hash generation tool that supports MD5, SHA-1, SHA-256 and other hash algorithms. Used for data integrity verification, password storage, and digital signature scenarios.

features.0: Support MD5, SHA-1, SHA-256, SHA-512 algorithms

useCases.3: Commit IDs in version control systems

tips.0: MD5 is no longer suitable for security scenarios, recommend using SHA-256
tips.1: Same input always produces the same hash value
tips.2: Minor input changes lead to completely different hashes
tips.3: Hash is a one-way function, cannot restore original text from hash value

0.q: Which hash algorithm is the most secure?
0.a: Currently SHA-256 and SHA-512 are considered secure, while MD5 and SHA-1 are considered insufficiently secure.

1.a: When different inputs produce the same hash value. Excellent hash algorithms should make collisions extremely difficult to occur.

color-converter.description: Color format conversion tool that supports mutual conversion between RGB, HEX, HSL, HSV and other color formats. Provides convenient color processing functions for designers and frontend developers.

features.0: Support RGB, HEX, HSL format conversion

tips.0: HEX format starts with #, like #FF0000 represents red
tips.1: RGB values range from 0-255, HSL H range is 0-360
tips.2: HSL is better for adjusting color brightness and saturation
tips.3: Note color display differences on different screens

0.q: Which is better to use, RGB or HSL?
0.a: RGB is intuitive and easy to understand, HSL is better for color adjustment and creating color variations.

1.a: Ensure sufficient contrast, avoid using only color to convey information, consider colorblind users' needs.
